text: Constitution Day of Kazakhstan (Kazakh: Қазақстан Республикасының Конституция күні) is the main national holiday in the Republic of Kazakhstan. Constitution Day is celebrated annually August 30. It commemorates the adoption of the Kazakhstani Constitution in 1995. Constitution Day is one of the most important holidays in Kazakhstan. == Celebrations == There are traditionally mass festivities, concerts, parades and fireworks on this day. The Supreme Court of Kazakhstan also conducts seminars in high schools around the country. * 2009 - It celebrated the 14th anniversary of the Constitution of Kazakhstan. It marked the first time that there was a military procession of the armed forces in Astana, the presiding officers of which were Adilbek Zhaksybekov and Major General Nurlan Dzhulamanov in their positions as Minister of Defense and Vice Minister of Defense respectively. Musical accompaniment for the parade were provided musicians of the Central Military Band of the Ministry of Defense of Kazakhstan, led by Colonel Alexander Belyakov. * 2010 - It celebrated the 15th anniversary of the Constitution of Kazakhstan. * 2011 - It celebrated the 16th anniversary of the Constitution of Kazakhstan. Kazakhstani pop stars such as Nagima Yeskaliyeva, Zhanna Orynbassarova, as well as songs from The Beatles, and Almaty Symphony Orchestra. == See also == * Public holidays in Kazakhstan * Kazakhstan Independence Day == References == Kazakhstan Category:Recurring events established in 1995 Category:1995 establishments in Kazakhstan Category:Public holidays in Kazakhstan
title: Constitution Day (Kazakhstan)
